import React, { Component } from 'react'; import Footer from '../include/footer'; import NextFooter from '../include/next_footer'; class Mail extends Component{ constructor(props){ super(props) this.state = { email: "", feed: "" } } onChange = (e) => { this.setState({[e.target.name]: e.target.value}); } render(){ return(

inboxes for good

) } } export default Mail;
